mapper.select: select distinct(roomNo) from chatRoom where (receiver=#{receiver} and sender=#{sender}) or receiver=#{sender} and sender=#{receiver}

select distinct employee.empno, empjob.jobname, employee.empname, department.deptname, chat.* from employee join empjob on employee.jobno=empjob.jobno join department on employee.DEPTNO = department.DEPTNO left join chat on employee.empno=chat.sender
select empNo from employee where empNo=#{receiver}
select * from chatRoom where (receiver=#{receiver} and sender=#{sender}) or receiver=#{sender} and sender=#{receiver}

select employee.empno, empjob.jobname, employee.empname, department.deptname, chat.readcount from employee join empjob on employee.jobno=empjob.jobno join department on employee.DEPTNO = department.DEPTNO left join chat on employee.empno=chat.sender where employee.empName like '%'||#{data}||'%'
select count(*) from chat where readCount=0 and receiver=#{userId}
mapper.update: update chat set readcount=1 where readcount=0 and receiver=#{sender} and sender=#{receiver}
mapper.insert: insert into chat values(seq_chat.nextval, #{roomNo}, #{receiver}, #{sender}, #{chatText}, default, sysdate)
